name: fetchAdherence(query:callbackQueue:completion:)
desc: Fetches all the events which match a query from a store, and calculates the percent of tasks completed for each day.Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func fetchAdherence(query: OCKAdherenceQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAdherence]>)
